## Encoding benchmark

This code provide a benchmark for encoding data by encryption.

It compares if it's faster to encrypt a full JSON or encrypt each field of the JSON.
It also compares the decryption.

Herer the transaction JSON used:
```json
{
    "address": "addr", 
    "type": "1",
    "data": {
        "encrypted_wallet": "656e632077616c6c6574", 
    },
    "timestamp": "1549488623", 
    "publicKey": "3059301306072a8648ce3d020106082a8648ce3d03010703420004035187cb1b21b3cf24afa631c97e17e5a48d69d765d1ab82170508ecd6d376134bbbeba132d7c94041f4b0e374704544dd879639ca25d67f58d2f9a8b6862f73", 
    "signature": "304502202222145dd82807eef22497cd101ac054351be1b843f7e3fc256f22ae9277ccde022100968561e30bec1bd38360b6b3986b2859252a8dfc9cca80ea8353287c6845e854", 
    "em_signature": "304502202222145dd82807eef22497cd101ac054351be1b843f7e3fc256f22ae9277ccde022100968561e30bec1bd38360b6b3986b2859252a8dfc9cca80ea8353287c6845e854"
}


```diff
$ go run main.go
-----------------
ENCRYPT FULL JSON
-----------------

728
====> Encryption took 0.000334 seconds <====
-------------------
ENCRYPT JSON FIELDS
-------------------
{"address":"0415910f51c7a10e7d7bbf60b28901cd8dc487f47867ae3d76cd4066bc79cd67f0d67518b0db1e93854a11c9906a37d9f855b9f60947c569e6fdb53c64610e2cf0365983c3b42092ff457ebe39bbb27c12397f8476f4e2bcb14b2febe255061bddb5f3b10a400d25be1639a6aee7a9e59af4931ab8","data":{"encrypted_Wallet":"656e632077616c6c6574"},"em_signature":"","publicKey":"","signature":"","timestamp":"04b11139ac7c621235676c6c35aff7444141ac4fd7c6ed4233a56a87fda9e217b7d3e534843212dd6586b69a3c14aa5223e7aa9b7106171ddf469db17f7f57161e7c45e5d209d0fd33e09d963dbec839b813723997e72f5fb494e4e7ce0661805fdc22358b700e37bd87d2579f94911786ea1ab27ab9bd01c06178","type":"04fc71293edb7983e1ce1b83857a7c649f3728ea39835770cdd004c9cb292510c947cabbcfe2bf1f779338ae67861e991b457b05efdfd4e3d2aa24b470126d6ea7d5a797b15d0d2be1cf09aa60e505a3e690b3425f7cf84a394536f23d06ad689049669d708d53cdca6c4b5c846fbf3c9d51"}
2456
====> Encryption took 0.000668 seconds <====
-----------------
DECRYPT FULL JSON
-----------------
map[type:1 address:addr data:map[encrypted_Wallet:656e632077616c6c6574] em_signature:304502202222145dd82807eef22497cd101ac054351be1b843f7e3fc256f22ae9277ccde022100968561e30bec1bd38360b6b3986b2859252a8dfc9cca80ea8353287c6845e854 publicKey:3059301306072a8648ce3d020106082a8648ce3d03010703420004035187cb1b21b3cf24afa631c97e17e5a48d69d765d1ab82170508ecd6d376134bbbeba132d7c94041f4b0e374704544dd879639ca25d67f58d2f9a8b6862f73 signature:304502202222145dd82807eef22497cd101ac054351be1b843f7e3fc256f22ae9277ccde022100968561e30bec1bd38360b6b3986b2859252a8dfc9cca80ea8353287c6845e854 timestamp:1.549488623e+09]

address: addr
publicKey: 3059301306072a8648ce3d020106082a8648ce3d03010703420004035187cb1b21b3cf24afa631c97e17e5a48d69d765d1ab82170508ecd6d376134bbbeba132d7c94041f4b0e374704544dd879639ca25d67f58d2f9a8b6862f73

emitter signature: 304502202222145dd82807eef22497cd101ac054351be1b843f7e3fc256f22ae9277ccde022100968561e30bec1bd38360b6b3986b2859252a8dfc9cca80ea8353287c6845e854
